name: One-Pan BBQ Baby Back Ribs Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: baby back ribs, salt, black pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, dried oregano, brown sugar, BBQ sauce, green beans
recipeInstructionSteps: Season the ribs with salt, black pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, oregano, and brown sugar. Rub in the seasonings evenly on both sides.
Place the ribs on a baking sheet lined with foil. Cover the ribs with foil.
Carefully uncover the ribs. Spread BBQ sauce evenly on top of the ribs.
Place green beans on the sides of the pan. Season the green beans with salt.
Transfer the ribs to a cutting board.
Cut between the bones to separate into individual ribs. Serve with green beans.
